title: Terrestrial
text:
**Terrestrial ECVs:**
1. River discharge
2. Water use
3. Groundwater
4. Lakes
5. Snow cover
6. Glaciers and ice caps
7. Ice sheets
8. Permafrost
9. Albedo
10. Land cover (including vegetation type)
11. Fraction of absorbed photosynthetically active radiation
12. Leaf area index
13. Above-ground biomass
14. Soil carbon
15. Fire disturbance
16. Soil moisture

For more information, see:
a) GCOS web page on ECVs
b) Guide to Climatological Practices (WMO-No. 100), Table 2.1
